g.text: Sample drawing only, not a real system design.
Server URL: First Login Server URL
Button: Sign Me Up if you're new
Password: secret if you have an account
Button: Log Me In if you have an account
Form Submission of First Login Welcome Page
Credentials: in form submission, if any
informative text, e.g. expected wait time
a link back to First Login Welcome Page,
in case user wants to try different email
follows redirect to Client Specific Server
Server URL: Client Specific Server URL
